snippet.title: Story Rich 2D Platformer | The Wizard and The Slug
snippet.description:
Jump, dash, and shoot your way through this story-rich action 2D platformer. Together with your magical wizard companion, play as the world's cutest, fastest, most agile slug as you explore a world full of charm, humor, and endearing characters.

WIZARD AND THE SLUG on Steam  ►► https://store.steampowered.com/app/1271170/The_Wizard_and_The_Slug/?utm_source=YouTube&utm_medium=Social&utm_campaign=Meridian4

-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------

TWITTER  ►► https://twitter.com/Meridian4 
STEAM  ►► https://store.steampowered.com/publisher/M4 

-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------

#2DPlatformer #SideScroller #Steam
